actions.name: Claw Strike
actions.special: If the target is surprised, it takes an additional 1d6 psychic damage.

actions.name: Shadow Leap
actions.effect: The Shadow Panther can teleport up to 20 ft. into a dimly lit or dark space without provoking opportunity attacks.

abilities_description.name: Keen Smell
abilities_description.effect: The Shadow Panther has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

abilities_description.name: Shadow Camouflage
abilities_description.effect: While in dim light or darkness, the Shadow Panther gains a +4 bonus to Stealth checks.
